attributes.review:
when i first downloaded this app, i never even dreamed of the side effects it would bring. it all began the night i downloaded it. at 3am i was woken up from a huge headache. i walked over to the mirror and noticed i was transforming into a karen. my hair started to cut itself into a dreadful haircut, non-vaccinated kids started popping out of nowhere, and i felt a strange urge to call for the manager at whatever place i went to. that wasn’t even the worst part. after i became a karen, live laugh love posters started hanging themselves on the walls. these posters turned out to be a portal to the netherworld. when i enteres one, i gazed at the lava boiling beneath me. i tried to turn back, but the portal had disappeared. i was first to wait for the next night so i could go back to my white suburban neighborhood. i found myself fighting of skeletons and zombies, and having to consume rotten flesh to survive. finally, when the clock struck 12, i was able to return. when i came back, however, i realized there was no escape. the mobs followed to earth and once there, they slowing started to turn into rascist oranges. they started to go around building walls so dirty mexicans couldn’t get in and called all minorities animals. they started kicking out all minorities and only left the orange and whites. soon, donald trump declared himself as their leader. he was the biggest orange of them all. he began sneaking into girls dressing rooms and raping them. he felt strange desires to date his daughter. worst of all, he banned minecraft. the days of my childhood were gone. he made everyone worship dr doofenshmirtz and dismantled OWCA so no one was left to fight against the evil scientists. they soon took over along with the oranges and split america in half. one side was called white supremacy land while the other was called the tri state area. soon, the oranges and evil scientist butted heads. they plunged the new america into a new civil war. and after that the world was never the same. i wish i could say i was lying but i can’t. do not download this app or else this could happen to you. i wouldn’t wish this on my worst enemy. always remember to LIVE everyday like it’s you last, LAUGH at every minion meme on facebook, and always  LOVE everyone (except for minorities and LGBTQ+ members because they have no place in society) 
             best regards,
                     Karen Smith
